Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2016 02:57AM Sary wrote: 4 months Diagnosed with lung mets in Nov 2015, 1.5 years after original Stage 2 diagnosis. Everyone (including doctors) told me I would be fine and had nothing to worry about. And yet, here I am.
